entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use versioned python3 command in scripts #48221
  • Improve Razor Component Sections #48219
  • Blazor Server App suddenly throws error in blazor.server.js: Range Offset is outside the bounds of the DataView #48216
  • Asp.Net core takes 12 minutes for initial page load #48215
  • JavaScript interop calls cannot be issued at this time. This is because the circuit has disconnected and is being disposed #48220
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #48208
  • Exception in the console of an empty Blazor WebAssembly app(dotnet.6.0.16) #48206
  • ASP.NET Core ❤️ Debugging #48205
  • Blazor CSP - Directive unsafe-inline for styles #48204

Closed

  • `IHttpContextScopedAccessor` for accessing `HttpContext` from request scoped DI components #47996
  • Fully occupied /tmp for ASP Dot Net Core hosted on AWS Lambda is breaking API's #48149
  • Make Http Logging Middleware Endpoint aware #43222
    8.0-preview4
  • Passing IServiceProvider to AddTransientHttpErrorPolicy like AddPolicyHandler #48200
  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.Abstractions' with .net 7.0.5 #48209
  • Aspnet core webhook #48153
  • Make Blazor Wasm SubDomain Routing Internal #48197
  • Unified app model routing #47668
    8.0-preview5
  • Remove `unsafe-eval` CSP Requirement for Blazor WASM #37787
    8.0-preview5
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #46533
    8.0-preview5
  • Consider breaking API change for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.RenderMode #47133
    8.0-preview5
  • Links are broken for published Blazor WebAssembly project on GitHub pages #48183
  • gRPC transcoding supports custom HttpRule #48192

PullRequests

Created

  • Add IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature to support accessing http.sys timing info #48218
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    needs-area-label
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #48207
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update HttpLoggingAttribute API #48214
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix build requirements (VS, yarn) #48213
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Revert Microsoft.CodeAnalysis package changes in prebuilt baseline #48212
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Remove use of legacy interop preventing CSP compliance in Blazor WebAssembly #48182
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Missing dot. #48202
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9af2053` to `2bc2374` #48210
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a358018` to `bb2941f` #48211
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Add support for custom HttpRule types to gRPC JSON transcoding #48194
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview5
  • Make KestrelConfigurationLoader.Load safe to re-call #48137
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Ensure DataProtection can be used in trimmed apps. #48082
    area-dataprotection
  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Load configuration in UseHttps #48138
    area-runtime
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Code Fix for AfterOnResourceExecution Diagnostic Event. #48077
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Allow declaring render modes, and emit the corresponding markers into HTML #48190
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
